title: Negotiation Skills
description: Enhance your French speaking skills with phrases suitable for negotiation contexts. Focus on precise pronunciation and strategic intonation.
instructions: Below, you'll find a list of phrases that are key to effective negotiation in French.
Your task is to record yourself speaking each phrase.
Ensure your pronunciation matches the provided text as closely as possible.
Try to maintain a calm, confident, and strategic speaking pace.
After recording each phrase, listen to your recording and compare it to the text.
Focus on intonation, clarity, and the persuasive expression of negotiation terms.
Repeat the recording process as many times as needed to improve your pronunciation.
